
                            
                            <p>刚看到一个视频说去的地方住宿五一涨价，我就问他你当地城市住宿涨价吗，如果你是老板五一涨价吗，看到涨价为什么还要订这酒店 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/18/073554r872gzx12u78dz11.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/18/073554r872gzx12u78dz11.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p><p class="pl">这都算涨的少的</p><p></p>
